client_id.description: The ID of the application that asks for authorization. An IndieAuth client ID is a URL.

code.title: Authorization code
code.description: Authorization code issued by the authorization endpoint of the IndieAuth server. It should be a single-use, unguessable, random string.

code_verifier.description: PKCE code verifier. A high-entropy cryptographic random string. See [Client Creates a Code Verifier](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7636#section-4.1).

redirect_uri.description: Holds a URL. A successful response from this endpoint results in a redirect to this URL.
